title: frame by frame
body: i sometimes get games where it starts to lag like everything is going by frames its soooooo bad. its been happening ever since patch 7.7

replies.body:
If this is happening over time as you go through the game, it might be caused by the assets that are being used. As the match goes on, more game assets are needed which could be making your fps drop. 

Let's be sure to check the most common reasons this happens by checking out this [**guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting)). Hit us back up if you've got any questions.
